title: [Sponsor] Ordoro
content:
Ordoro is an all-in-one order management platform for the omnichannel ecommerce merchant. With a feature-rich app and our flex pricing, you’ll have everything a growing retailer needs to scale with confidence. Select batches of orders, create shipping labels, and keep your inventory in sync all at once. With automation rules and presets, we’ll take on the heavy lifting to reduce human error.

Launched in 2010, we’re a small team of people who are passionate about creating the best product possible. We’ve grown primarily through word of mouth, and last year our platform helped ship over 12,000,000 ecommerce orders worldwide.

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
